import React from 'react' import { useEffect } from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' // import SideBar from '../SideBar' import Header from './Header' import './Homecss.css' export default function Home() { const [products, setProduct] = useState([]) console.log(products); useEffect(() => { fetch('https://fakestoreapi.com/products') .then(res => res.json()) .then(json => setProduct(json)) }, []) return ( <>
{/* */}
{products.map((item) =>

$ {item.price}

{item.title}

Save $20.00 (16%)

)}
) }
